name: UpdateUserNotificationRule
description:
Update a user's notification rule in PagerDuty.

Use this tool to modify an existing notification rule for a user on a PagerDuty account, allowing them to manage how they receive incident notifications.

parameters.description: The unique ID of the user's notification resource to be updated.

parameters.name: notification_rule_id
parameters.description: The ID of the user's notification rule to update in PagerDuty.

value_schema.description: The notification rule ID on the user.
